The firepower from Grimlock and Lord Elder hold several sweeps at bay 
as 2=
0 sweep craft streaked over from the main host led by Scourge, 
Tummult, Da=
rkfate and Nightstrike. 

Concentrated defenses from the Ark and the shuttl=
e quickly begin to 
whittle into this number as several sweeps disappeared =
in bright 
explosions of metal and smoke! 

Scourge and Tummult spread out =
into wide arcs allowing the sweeps to 
move forward in an attempt to `softe=
n up' the defending maximals, 
even as their own cannons rotate on their mo=
re stationary foes and 
unleash a deadly cacophony of power at their appare=
ntly defenseless 
opponents . . .  . . . an attack that never reaches its t=
arget! As 
the disintegration beams from the sweeps reach the last few mete=
rs to 
the ark they impact and are rebuffed by some sort of powerful force =

shield, leaving the ark unscathed. 

"DESTROY THE LEADERSHIP AND THE SWEEP=
S WILL FALL" A familiar voice 
sounds across Lord Elder's radio. 

"I HAVE =
TAPPED ARK ENERGY STORES, AND HAVE SUFFICIENT ENERGY RESERVES 
NOW TO MAINT=
AIN THIS SHIELDING FOR A SHORT PERIOD." 

Cannon fire from Legacy brightene=
d the skies for a moment as it 
passes through his own shielding and destro=
yed a sweep craft that 
ventured too close. "IF THE ARK IS DAMAGED BEYOND A=
 CERTAIN POINT WE 
MAY LOOSE EVERYTHING EVEN IF WE RETAIN THE MATRIX."

As =
Scorponok stood to his full height sweeps seemed to swarm on him 
from seve=
ral different directions, several of them cut down almost 
immediately by h=
is machine gun batteries. With a swipe of his mighty 
pincer Scorponok is a=
bly to capture a sweep, his claw biting deeply 
into its armor. 

As Scorpo=
nok looked around he can clearly see 9 more sweeps around 
him, several of =
them orienting on him and fire a deadly barrage of 
laser fire at him!

> J=
hiaxus pulls up high and tries to drop more cluster bombs.
>
> Jhiaxus: So =
many of them! How do we dog such an enemy?!

Myrmidon chuckled darkly, "Whe=
n a predator takes on a prey more 
numerous and nearly as powerful as he, t=
hen he must choose his victim 
carefully."

Myrmidon, still in star-fighter=
 mode shifted angles and launched 
rockets at the sweeps, adding to the clu=
ster bombs Jhiaxus already 
had in the air. Several sweeps exploded as othe=
rs veered off. 

"It may be wise for all of us to co-ordinate our attacks. =
With two of 
us here and others in other places, these minions can separate=
 us and 
pick us off at their leisure."

Even as he spoke, several sweeps f=
ired strafing shots at the two 
aerial Decepticons!

As Hydras, Perceptor a=
nd Darkhawk opened fire against the sweeps the 
reactions was swift and dir=
ect! 15 sweeps separated themselves from 
the host and moved at Hydras and =
his crew as fusion grenades flew 
through the air at them!

> Hydras shoute=
d by com link "PREDACONS AND DECEPTICONS! !! PROTECT 
THE 
> ARK!!!"

"WILL=
 YOU SHUT UP!!!!!!" came an unfamiliar female voice boomed 
loudly over Hyd=
ras' channel! (OOC: Decibel) "You could have been one 
of us, but now you w=
ill be cannon fodder! *DIE!!*"

Twin sonic missiles streak towards Hydras' =
shuttle, even as a high 
pitched scream can be heard over the radio, effect=
ively squelching 
communications. 

((OOC: Anyone communicating into or out=
 from the area near Hydras, 
Perceptor and Darkhawk (might cover Scorpi, My=
rmidon and Jhiaxus as 
well =96 not sure how close together they are) will =
only hear a high 
pitched shriek))

Cyclonus frowned inwardly as he saw his=
 attack thwarted by Rodimus. 
With a quick boost of power Cyclonus banked a=
round in an attempt to 
line up another shot. Using his superior speed over=
 Rodimus he 
maneuvered to dodge the weapons fire, but clearly underestimat=
ed his 
foe! The first shot missed - as it was designed to do, the bright 
=
lights distracting and partially blinding him! The blindness allows 
the se=
cond one to hit him in the under plating knocking him to the 
side as he be=
gan to fall from the air. 

In a desperate maneuver Cyclonus shifted to his=
 robot form as he 
crashed on the ground, his legs barely getting beneath h=
im before he 
hits absorbing the impact. 

A lesser robot would have taken =
severe damage, and as it is Cyclonus' 
armor is dented from his unexpected =
landing, but Cyclonus quickly 
stands his face cool and calm as he observed=
 his opponent. 

"It would seem your recent um modifications have not dulle=
d your 
edge." Cyclonus' voice echoed across to Rodimus, "Good!" 

With a q=
uick movement Cyclonus fired twined laser cannons at Rodimus 
as he smiled;=
 it was good to have a worthy opponent!
